title: Print Mag body identification
content:
Hey guys,

I'm having a hard time finding out what the body copy for Print magazine is?

Any ideas? Similar fonts?

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131111842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/printbody_5958.jpg)
author: Rorbot

comments.content: Lexicon ( [http://www.teff.nl/fonts/lexicon/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131111842/http:/www.teff.nl/fonts/lexicon/index.html "http://www.teff.nl/fonts/lexicon/index.html")) by Bram de Does. One of my favourite text typefaces EVER.
